name: Scour The Dark
description:
Scour The Dark                     

_____________________________________________________________________________________

A top-down horror-shooter for two players. 

Make your way through an eerie abandoned office-complex, battle a swarm of nighmarish creatures and find the nest that spawns them. 

Then plant the bomb and get out before it detonates.

This game is the result of a 9-week game-project at PlaygroundSquad.

_____________________________________________________________________________________

  Artist

  • Hampus Westerlund
  • Rebekah Landfeldt
  • John Gustafsson
  • Line Skaras
  • Markus Hag
  • Olivia Grönlund
  • Otto Gafvelin

  Designer 

  • Alexei Vallgårda
  • Pontus Johansson
  • Timmy Jonsson

Programmer

  • Felix Emblad
  • Arvid Holm
  • Julius Edvardsson
  • Victor Lundström                               
This game needs two controllers to be played.
